titleStmt.title: The command of God to his people to come out of Babylon, Revel. 18. 4, demonstrated to mean the coming out of the present papal Rome with a most earnest perswasive to all to come out who are in it, ...
titleStmt.author: Beverley, Thomas.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Thomas Beverley. cf. BM.
